parts.name: summary
parts.description: The element used to open and close collapsible content.

parts.name: toggle
parts.description: The element used as indicator, can represent an icon.

parts.name: summary-content
parts.description: The wrapper for the slotted summary content.

parts.name: content
parts.description: The wrapper for the collapsible details content.

states.description: Set when the collapsible content is expanded and visible.
Set when the element is disabled.
Set when the element is focused using the keyboard.
Set when the element is focused.
